pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diversity Indices for Numerical Matrices // Providing functions to calculate indices of diversity on numerical matrices based on information theory. The rationale behind the package is described in Rocchini, Marcantonio and Ricotta (2017) doi:10.1016/j.ecolind.2016.07.039 and Rocchini, Marcantonio,..., Ricotta (2021) doi:10.1101/2021.01.23.427872.
